Design makes a huge impact.

Here’s 10 simple ways you can help.

Share

Designed to Help was created by Alex Dahl. I’m a user experience and product designer in San Francisco, focused on improving people’s lives with technology.

This started as my senior thesis in college

Typeset in Adelle and Adelle Sans from TypeTogether, through Typekit. Built with Jekyll and hosted by GitHub. Hand-crafted in Coda and Creative Cloud.
